course_details: Learn the C programming, including variables, loops, and functions. Master the art of writing efficient and bug-free code in C.
Explore the world of algorithms and problem-solving techniques. Understand how algorithms drive modern computing systems.
Get a solid foundation in C++ programming with a focus on Data Structures and Algorithms. Enhance your coding skills.
Learn essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and stacks. Apply them to solve real-world problems efficiently.
Discover the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python. Build reusable and well-structured code.
Dive into the world of software engineering methodologies and best practices. Learn to design, develop, and maintain robust software.
Become proficient in Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing. Deploy and manage scalable applications in the cloud.
Explore the foundations of cloud computing, including virtualization, storage. Harness the power of cloud resources.
Master MySQL, a popular relational database management system. Learn to design and query databases efficiently.
